summary: Make glow in your hand invisible while casting magic.
descriptionHtml:
I uploading this mod here because some people write me they want it. So here it is, a mod that makes glow invisible in your hand while you casting.

You can see big difference while you casting,for example sparks, flames or frostbite.

There is not much to say, it is pretty simple. Just copy Data folder from downloaded file into your Skyrim and thats it.

100% compatible with everything.

Enjoy
author: Edwarr
